channel.title: Runserver help
channel.description:
ok when ever i run my server it works fine but when someone logs off/dc's on the runserver.bat or watever it says [code]ClientHandler accepted [/code] after accepted it says like local host if its me
and whn i log in again it says rejected instead of accepted can someone help me please? its light soul source.
